mapper.insert: insert into KANBAN_LIST (LIST_TITLE, ALL_BOARD_LIST_NO , id) values(#{listTitle}, #{allBoardListNo}, #{id});
mapper.update: update KANBAN_CARD set title = #{title} , write_date = now() where card_no = #{cardNo};

mapper.select: select b.comment_no, b.content, b.write_date, b.id, b.card_no , u.nickname, u.image from board_comment b inner join `user` u on b.id = u.id where card_no = #{cardNo} order by b.comment_no desc;
